definitions.title: n.pr.loc
definitions.body: (young men's village) of a small town of Benjamin beyond the Mt. of Olives on the way to Jericho (cf. Rob:BR i. 433; Kasteren:ZPV 1890, 100 ff.) 2Sa 3:16, 2Sa 16:5, 2Sa 17:18, 2Sa 19:17, 1Ki 2:8 (= [[עַלְמוֹן]] acc. to Targum:Jon Schwarz Marti-Schick:ZPV iii. 8 f.
